title: Mobile Data Connection failed
content:
Hi,
I have a Pixel 3 and since 3 weeks it's a bit annoying to surf on mobile data - websites don't charge at all, the site can't be reached, no DNS record found etc. After trying to load a couple of times there is no change. Just after a minute or so it s possible to charge again.

I never had this problem before - does anybody experience the same problem?
